snippet: Pauline Mercurius, 42, says she is “mentally, physically, emotionally” exhausted struggling to care for her family, including 12-year-old triplets who have sickle cell anemia.
abstract: UJA-Federation of New York, one of the organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Pauline Mercurius of the Bronx with expenses in caring for her family, including triplets who all have sickle cell anemia.
lead_paragraph: Pauline Mercurius, 42, says she is “mentally, physically, emotionally” exhausted struggling to care for her family, including 12-year-old triplets who have sickle cell anemia.
